name: BoxR
description:
Simple to play but hard to master
Jump on the top of boxes without letting the sides hit you, simple... right?
You'll likely have some crazy deaths and go crazy wondering why you can't get past level 10. If you end up getting past 20, post a screenshot on Twitter or Instagram #boxrScore, if you have a crazy death post it with #boxrDeath.
Hint: don't stand too close to where boxes spawn or you might get knocked out.

A parody-based game for Real Civil Engineer fans
